## isArrayOfString() function

Determines whether the input is array of string or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isArrayOfString(input: unknown): input is string[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

input


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

input


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

input is string\[\]

true if the input is array, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
isArrayOfString(["a", "b", "c"]) // true
isArrayOfString(["a", "b", 1])   // false
```
